Articles.Content:
I'm currently getting onto Tier 4.

Only got one tier four though, A P51.

Anyone up to play? Add me at "Fujikinz"

I'd be willing to play lower tiers with someone!

This is a great WW2-Early cold war Plane and Tank game. Really would recommend it.

Only play the planes, only teir 1. Can't play tanks cos laptop dies.

Username - Greenbean1
